product_summary: Clevis is a no-code platform that allows users to build and sell AI-powered applications. With a wide range of pre-built processing steps, users can build apps with features such as text generation, image generation, and web scraping.
product_pros: No-code development: Clevis enables users to build AI-powered applications without writing code.
Pre-built processing steps: Clevis provides a range of pre-built processing steps that can be combined to build complex applications.
User-friendly interface: Clevis has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to build and manage applications.
Sell access to apps: Clevis allows users to sell access to their applications with usage-based pricing.
Embed apps on websites: Clevis apps can be embedded on existing websites.
product_cons: Limited AI models: Clevis currently only supports ChatGPT and DALL-E.
Pricing can be expensive for high-volume usage: Clevis charges for app runs based on the number of credits consumed.
May require technical knowledge for complex applications: While Clevis is a no-code platform, building complex applications may require some technical knowledge.
Limited customization options: Clevis offers limited customization options for app design.
Early stage: Clevis is a relatively new platform and may not have all the features and functionality of more established platforms.

product_usecases.details: Clevis can be used to build apps that generate recipes based on dietary preferences.
Clevis can be used to build apps that generate character ideas for novels, complete with portraits and backstories.
Clevis can be used to build apps that recommend clothing based on the current weather and the user's location.
Clevis can be used to build apps that generate blog posts for a given subject, complete with header images, and upload them to a WordPress blog.
Clevis can be used to build apps that provide personalized product recommendations to website visitors, increasing conversions.

product_toolfor.details: Clevis is a great tool for developers who want to build AI-powered applications without writing code.
Clevis is a great tool for entrepreneurs who want to build and sell AI-powered applications without the need for technical expertise.
Clevis is a great tool for marketers who want to use AI to create personalized content and experiences.
Clevis is a great tool for content creators who want to use AI to generate ideas and create engaging content.
Clevis is a great tool for business owners who want to use AI to automate tasks and improve efficiency.
